name: Lisa: The Timeless
storyline: Step into the shoes of Elton Broll, an elderly, floral shirted man living in the womanless post-apocalyptic wasteland of Olathe. In a stroke of bad luck, Elton is mugged, and made the enemy of the local Syndicate. Accompanied by a new friend, Berny Connorfold, Elton must elude the mutants, monsters, mercenaries, magicians, and murderers all coming after him, in a bid to return some sense of normalcy to his once otherwise boring life.
summary: Lisa: The Timeless is a fan game based on the world established by Austin Jorgensen’s title, Lisa: The Painful, as a story set outside of the main plot of the original Lisa trilogy.
